summary: AN ORDINANCE revising the 1992 annual budget by decreasing certain expenditure allowances and increasing certain other expenditure allowances in the 1992 budgets of various City departments and agencies from various City funds; to provide for various costs and expenses not provided for in the 1992 budget by appropriation, reappropriation, and transfer from various City funds including the Emergency Fund, and declaring the emergency therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
